title: The Fermat curves and arrangements of lines and conics
authors: Nils Peder Astrup Toft and Torgunn Karoline Moe
abstract:
In this paper we present new results about arrangements of lines and conics
associated to the Fermat curves in the projective plane. The first result is
that we compute the 2-Hessian to a Fermat curve, which is a union of lines, and
we determine the singularities of this line arrangement. Then we consider the
sextactic points on the Fermat curves and show that they are distributed on
three grids. The lines in the grids constitute new line arrangements associated
with the Fermat curves, and we determine the singularities on each of them. The
main result is that we compute the hyperosculating conics to the Fermat curves,
study the arrangement of these conics, and find that they intersect in a
special way.
